comment.author: 101426662@N02
comment._content: Fourth man from left is Alan Shepard and 5th is Gordon Cooper.  The man at far right is wearing the same Visitor badges as the Shepard, Cooper, and the uniformed officer on the far left.  So the man on the far right might be a Mercury astronaut (possibly Deke Slayton?) and is at least part on the same tour group.
